page.title: 16LIFE IN A PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content:
Life in a Public House is fun and sometimes tiring. Opening and closing times are as follows:-
Sundays Noon-2pm & 7pm - 10.30pm Mondays to Thursdays 10am-2.30pm & 6pm - 10.30pm Fridays and Saturdays 10am-2.30pm & 6pm - 11pm
We also have a helper who looks after the Pub every Tuesday and a cleaner who come every morning to clean the Pub. We have a fruit machine which needs maintenance every day. In the Pub I have several jobs to do, like re-stocking crisps and drinks (way over 50 different types). During the summer months opening may be extended to 11pm on weekdays at the licencee's discretion.
